Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DBHandler
    Handles all requests to the SQL database
    DBHandlerTest
    Used to test DBHandler.java during development
    Inventory
    display inventory list, handle the quantity update and search the part in the inventory
    MainMenu  
    Overview
    Overview of the stockroom, showing the completed and building orders, and the parts are missing from work orders
    OverviewUI
    Graphic User Interface of Overview
    Purchasing
    purchasing shows the parts are out of stock and parts are in low quantity so that user can handle purchasing of these items
    PurchasingUI
    purchasing user interface shows the parts are out of stock and parts are in low quantity so that user can handle purchasing of these items
    Receiving
    Create the command line menu for people who receives items.
    ReceivingGUI
    Configure Receiving Class from command line to GUI.
    Shipping
    Handles shipping of completed workorders.
    StockroomApp
    This class is deprecated.
    TableData  
    WorkOrder
    Handles the creation of new products, by logging the bill of materials of that product to the MySQL database under the PRODUCTS and PRODUCT_BOM tables.
